subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: David Zabriskie of the United States won the Tour de Romandie time trial in Signal-de-Bougy, Switzerland, and Cadel Evans took the overall lead with one stage left.
snippet: David Zabriskie of the United States won the Tour de Romandie time trial in Signal-de-Bougy, Switzerland, and Cadel Evans took the overall lead with one stage left.
